strapiPost.title: K1 Speed Announces Indoor Go-Kart Center for Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Add an indoor go-kart center to the list of exciting developments in Northwest Arkansas. K1 Speed recently announced plans to open an entertainment center in Rogers.

Mr. Worldwide: K1 Speed has over 72 locations worldwide, offering high-speed electric go-kart racing. Dates for the Rogers location have not yet been announced.

Party On: TheÂ entertainment center will feature an electric go-kart race track, an arcade, pool tables, air hockey, and a restaurant, making it a great place to host birthdays, bachelor parties, company parties, and more.

Learn more about the Rogers location and receive updates HERE.
